Package array

Class Array.ArrayIterator<T>

java.lang.Object
array.Array.ArrayIterator<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of elements in the Array.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<T>, Iterator<T>
Enclosing class:
Array<T>
public static class Array.ArrayIterator<T> extends Object implements Iterator<T>, Iterable<T>
An iterator for iterating over the elements of an Array.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ArrayIterator(Array<T> array)
    Constructs an ArrayIterator for the given Array with the ability to remove elements.

    Constructs an ArrayIterator for the given Array with the ability to remove elements.
